starter-package.title: Layout All-in-one
starter-package.description: Website & Service included: Every edit, hosting, updates, and security covered.

popup.description: Starter package for your professional online presence. Ideal for small businesses or projects that want to go online quickly.

benefits.title: Simple and Transparent Subscription:
benefits.descr: Starting at 150 CHF per month for one page, up to 190 CHF for five pages.

benefits.title: Rapid Deployment:
benefits.descr: Your site can be operational in just 2 weeks.

benefits.title: No Initial Fees:
benefits.descr: No initial costs, you only pay the monthly subscription.

benefits.title: No Commitment:
benefits.descr: Total freedom to cancel the subscription at any time without complications.

benefits.title: Turnkey and Hassle-Free:
benefits.descr: Updates, content changes, security patches, and hosting all included.

benefits.title: Perfect for Essential Needs:
benefits.descr: Ideal for small businesses and independent professionals looking for a simple and effective web solution.

benefits.title: Swiss Design and Coding:
benefits.descr: Every element of the site is designed and coded by hand in Switzerland, ensuring unmatched quality and attention to detail.

benefits.title: High Performance and Optimized Design:
benefits.descr: High-performing sites, designed to maximize conversions, with scores above 90 on Lighthouse.

benefits.title: SEO Optimized:
benefits.descr: Each website is optimized for Onpage SEO from the start, to ensure the best possible visibility.

limitations: Ideal for small websites with up to five pages
Standard features without special extras (e.g., blog or multilingualism)

premium-package.title: Layout Business
premium-package.description: Custom-built, feature-rich website with one year of premium support included.

popup.description: The premium package for demanding online projects. Perfect for companies with a higher budget that value individuality and comprehensive service.

benefits.title: Flexibility and Customization:
benefits.descr: Thanks to our online calculator, you can easily configure your site and get an instant price.

benefits.title: Advanced Evolution Possibilities:
benefits.descr: Add features as needed by browsing through the add-ons available in our configurator.

benefits.title: One Year of Premium Support:
benefits.descr: Enjoy a year of updates, security patches, hosting, performance reports, and design adjustments included.

benefits.title: Swiss Design and Coding:
benefits.descr: Each site is meticulously designed and coded by hand in Switzerland, ensuring a high-quality and personalized product.

benefits.title: SEO Optimized:
benefits.descr: Each website is optimized for Onpage SEO from the start, to ensure the best possible visibility.

benefits.title: Data Analysis and Enterprise-Level Security:
benefits.descr: For optimized performance and complete peace of mind.

benefits.title: Accessibility and Sustainable Development:
benefits.descr: Sites designed to be inclusive and environmentally friendly.

benefits.title: Total Ownership of the Site:
benefits.descr: Once purchased, the site is entirely yours.

configurator.config-mainTitle: One step closer to your perfect website
configurator.config-descr: We are ready to analyze your selection and provide personalized strategies that precisely fit your needs.

features.title: Just the Essentials:
features.descr: A simple page that typically includes the following sections: home, about, your offer, and how to contact you.

features.title: Expand Your Site:
features.descr: Ideal for separating your content into multiple pages such as: home page, about page, services or products page, and your contact page.

features.title: Maximize Your Impact:
features.descr: Having 8 pages at your disposal you can, for example, add details on each service or product, highlight case studies, detail your mission and values, and include a space for news or articles.

features.title: The Ultimate Space for Your Site:
features.descr: Take advantage of this generous space to cover all aspects of your activity: detailed services, extensive portfolio, in-depth presentation of your team, multiple case studies, news, blog articles, and much more. Ideal for businesses looking to provide a rich and informative experience to their visitors.

features.title: Custom Fields:
features.descr: Precisely choose the information you wish to collect.

features.title: Spam Protection:
features.descr: So you can focus on the important messages.

features.title: Automatic Responses:
features.descr: Show your visitors that their message has been received instantly.

features.title: Direct Communication:
features.descr: Create a direct communication channel with your clients or subscribers to keep them informed of news and offers.

features.title: Increased Engagement:
features.descr: Boost your audience engagement with regular newsletters that highlight your content and offers.

features.title: Performance Tracking:
features.descr: Benefit from detailed analysis on the performance of your email campaigns to optimize your future communications.

features.title: Simplified Reservations:
features.descr: Offer your clients an easy and intuitive method to book directly on your site, improving user experience and boosting your conversions.

features.title: Centralized Management:
features.descr: Manage all your reservations in one place, with an easy-to-use system for you and your team, reducing the risk of errors and saving time.

features.title: Real-Time Availability:
features.descr: Show real-time availability to prevent overbooking and efficiently manage customer expectations.

features.title: Confirmation and Automatic Reminders:
features.descr: Automate booking confirmations and reminders to reduce no-shows and improve customer satisfaction.

features.title: Visual Showcase:
features.descr: Highlight your work, products, or services through an attractive and professional image gallery or portfolio.

features.title: Intuitive Navigation:
features.descr: Allow visitors to easily navigate your gallery with an intuitive and responsive user interface.

features.title: Loading Optimization:
features.descr: Ensure a fast and smooth experience even for image-rich galleries, thanks to loading optimization techniques.

features.title: Dynamic Content:
features.descr: Enrich your site with a blog or articles that invigorate your content, improving SEO and capturing your visitors' attention.

features.title: Showcase Expertise:
features.descr: Demonstrate your expertise and share your knowledge through relevant blog articles, strengthening trust and client engagement.

features.title: Increased Interactivity:
features.descr: Encourage interactions by allowing visitors to leave comments, thus increasing engagement and brand loyalty.

features.title: Boosted SEO:
features.descr: Benefit from improved search engine rankings through regularly updated content, helping your site gain visibility.

features.title: Management Autonomy:
features.descr: Gain the freedom to easily update your site's content, without needing technical skills, thanks to an intuitive interface.

features.title: Security and Reliability:
features.descr: Enjoy a secure and reliable system, ensuring your site stays protected against online threats while ensuring optimal performance.

features.title: Real-Time Updates:
features.descr: Ensure your site is always up to date with real-time changes, allowing instant response to your business needs.

features.title: Open Your Site to the World:
features.descr: Expand your audience by making your site accessible in multiple languages, capturing the interest of international visitors.

features.title: Simplified Language Management:
features.descr: Easily manage content in different languages with an intuitive interface, ensuring perfect consistency across linguistic versions.

features.title: Localized SEO:
features.descr: Improve your ranking in different regions and languages, attracting more visitors with SEO tailored to each language.

features.title: Personalized User Experience:
features.descr: Offer a smooth and personalized user experience by automatically displaying content in the visitor's language.

features.title: Captivating Content:
features.descr: Benefit from professional texts that capture attention, strengthen your brand message, and encourage action.

features.title: SEO Optimization:
features.descr: Improve your online visibility with content optimized for search engines, drawing more traffic to your site.

features.title: Consistent Brand Tone:
features.descr: Ensure consistent communication across your site with a carefully crafted and steady brand tone.

features.title: Improved Conversion:
features.descr: Increase your conversion rates with persuasive calls to action and clearly defined messages.

features.title: Strong Brand Identity:
features.descr: Create a memorable first impression with a distinctive logo that reflects the essence and values of your brand.

features.title: Custom Design:
features.descr: Benefit from a custom logo design, created exclusively for your business, ensuring uniqueness and relevance.

features.title: Visual Consistency:
features.descr: Strengthen the consistency of your visual identity across all mediums, from the website to business cards and social media.

features.title: High-Resolution Files:
features.descr: Receive your logo in various high-resolution file formats, ready for printing and the web.

features.title: Solid Brand Foundations:
features.descr: Gain the essential elements to build a strong brand identity from the start, including a logo, color palette, typography, and visual style that truly represent who you are.

features.title: Custom Color Palette:
features.descr: Use a custom color palette designed to reflect the values and energy of your brand, ensuring immediate recognition.

features.title: Harmonized Typography:
features.descr: Enjoy a selection of fonts that not only complement your brand's aesthetics but also enhance readability and user experience on your site.

features.title: Cross-Platform Consistency:
features.descr: Ensure a consistent brand presence across all platforms, from social media to the website, with an easy-to-follow style guide.

features.title: Custom Brand Images:
features.descr: Capture the essence of your brand with professional photographs that speak to your audience and highlight your unique value proposition.

features.title: On-Site Photography:
features.descr: Benefit from a photography service directly at your premises, for authentic images of your team, your products, or your workspace.

features.title: Exceptional Visual Quality:
features.descr: Elevate the level of your website and marketing materials with high-resolution images, ensuring a professional and memorable impression.

features.title: Brand Image Consistency:
features.descr: Ensure visual consistency across all your online and offline channels, strengthening your brand's recognition with your target audience.

hero-section.title: Web agency Switzerland
hero-section.p: Get premium Swiss web designs with straightforward, reliable support that boosts your business online.

paragraph-section.p: We believe that every brand has a unique narrative to tell. Our goal is to design and develop websites that not only grab your visitors' attention but also contribute tangible benefits to your business's success.

core-section.title: Performance
core-section.p: We prioritize rapid loading and smooth interactions. Discover Layout.ch's commitment to websites that work as beautifully as they look.

left-wrapper.text1: The focus at our agency is to elevate your business presence through sites that are not only visually captivating but also exceptionally functional.
left-wrapper.text2: At Layout.ch, our commitment is the creation of unique digital identities that resonate deeply with your audience. By harnessing the latest in web technology, we design compelling, high-performance websites.

faq-section.title: Frequently
faq-section.p: Discover quick answers to common questions and get clarity on how we partner with you for your web design needs.

cards.title: What services does Layout.ch offer?
text: At Layout.ch, we offer two tailored solutions for your online presence. 'Layout Basic' gets you up and running quickly and efficiently - perfect for small businesses or projects that want to go online fast. Our 'Layout Premium' package, on the other hand, includes a complete analysis and custom functionalities for sophisticated websites, complete with one year of VIP support covering all necessary updates and maintenance.

cards.title: How long does it take to create a website?
text: At Layout.ch, the development of simple websites starts within just 5 to 10 days. For more comprehensive projects, we dedicate all the necessary time to ensure every detail aligns with your vision and that the website optimally supports your business. Our aim is to create top-quality websites that not only impress but also deliver tangible added value to your company.

cards.title: What sets Layout.ch apart from other web agencies?
text: At Layout.ch, we have a clear mission: We do web design and nothing else. Unlike other agencies that offer a bit of everything, we're fully dedicated to creating unbeatable websites.

This focus allows us to dive deep into the nuances of design and deliver custom solutions that perfectly match what you and your brand need. Templates? Not with us. We take the time to thoroughly analyze your business and the market to develop a website that truly sets you apart from the competition.

cards.title: How do we measure the success of a new website?
text: With Layout.ch, you gain insights into real-time performance after your website launch. We use analytics to analyze user behavior and adjust strategies to achieve your goals. Benchmarking values from before the launch help us to measure progress and secure successes.
